name: Rocketshade
description: Rocketshade is a sleek and stylish oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its forest green box, it stands out among other robots. Its arms and legs are equipped with rocket boosters, allowing it to move swiftly and effortlessly. The screen on its chest displays a mesmerizing snake pattern, captivating anyone who gazes upon it. To add an extra touch of coolness, Rocketshade is adorned with a pair of sleek shades. This unique combination of traits makes Rocketshade an eye-catching and powerful member of the WebtrES club.
